long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitLife Classroom 6x

Do you find your life tedious and boring? Do you want to live a new life according to your wishes? The game BitLife Life Simulator will help you!

It's still a fun game, but now everything is behind a paywall. Even options that used to be free. And there are so many ads, I can't even click on anything without an ad playing. I get that ads are how you make money without having players and stuff, but everything is locked behind a price tag to the point where you're already making so much money.

BitLife life simulator game introduction:
BitLife is a life simulation game where users take control of a stranger's life from start to finish. It was released by Candy writer, a free app that, although not very well known on Google Play, has made a big impact on the gaming community. BITLIFE allows users to experience what it would be like to be an actor or what they would do in their old age, using a list of instructions, random events and humour.

This game has simple gameplay, basically the same as other simulation games. However, in this game you choose actions for each character's time instead of choosing dialogue. For example, at the age of 18 you will choose a character to study a major at college or maybe even join the army.

Characters in the game will have 4 basic stats, including health, happiness, appearance and intelligence. In my opinion, health is the most important factor because only when you are healthy can you do more things. You can improve your appearance with make-up, dress up with clothes or accessories, or even have plastic surgery. As for IQ, you can raise it by going to school. Sometimes you can scare the police with your bad choices, but unfortunately, while catching criminals you will be attacked by them and your life will be over.

How to play BitLife
The rules of the game are very simple, you just have to choose the actions that are appropriate for the situation.
